snippet: The 27-year-old Michael Thompson grabbed the spotlight at the United States Open as he put together a front-running round of four-under-par 66, which he capped with a birdie at 18.
abstract: Michael Thompson takes the first-round lead, and the spotlight, at United States Open golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: The 27-year-old Michael Thompson grabbed the spotlight at the United States Open as he put together a front-running round of four-under-par 66, which he capped with a birdie at 18.

headline.seo: 2012 U.S. Open: Michael Thompson Grabs the Lead and the Attention
headline.main: A Player in His Third Major Grabs the Lead and the Attention
headline.print_headline: A Player in His Third Major Grabs the Lead and the Attention
